content: Announcing HeadsTails.xyz, a prediction betting platform on the blockchain!What is it exactly?HeadsTails is a community-powered platform for betting on the predictions of real-world events using cryptocurrency. HeadsTails is hosted on Binance Smart Chain, platform currency is BUSD BEP20. Topics span a range of categories, including politics, world events, sports, science, public health, and more.How does it work?Prediction betting allows you to place bets on the outcome of real-world events. There are other prediction betting sites, but they are needlessly complex. As the name "HeadsTails" implies, every topic on the platform is a simple "yes" or "no" bet, and you are free to bet as much or as little as you like.HT has to resolve the question (select a winning answer) within 7 days of the question end date. The resolution source is transparent. If we don’t, users can unstake their tokens. This feature is built into the smart contract. This ensures that when users take part in a question, it will either result in the winnings to be distributed to the users or the funds can be claimed back by the users. HT cannot keep hold of the funds incase a question is not settled and winning answer not chosen.The platform also has a points system. You get ranking points for winning bets. A global leader board shows top-ranking players. Monthly prizes will be on offer to top performers.Users can also follow and see the dashboard of other users to see what questions they are taking part in.★ Check out the websiteLINKS★ Watch the 1 minute explainer video★ Read the full documentation★ Read the Litepaper (Github alternative)★ Check out the Security Audit (Score of 96!)★ Join us on TelegramSECURITY:The platform is secured by smart contract, and all functions are verifiably secure. We are holding the launch of the platform for the release of the smart contract audit, for general transparency and security. Coming soon!TRUSTLESS TOPIC RESOLUTION:Every question has a verifiable end date. HeadsTails must resolve the question and select the winning side within 7 days of the question end date. If this is not completed on time, users can freely unstake their tokens. This feature is built into the smart contract. This ensures that when users take part in a question, it will either result in the winnings distributed to the users or the funds claimed back by the users. HeadsTails cannot keep funds in the event a resolution is not reached. USER ENGAGEMENT: The platform has a points system. A user gets ranking points for winning bets. A global leader board shows the top-ranking players. Monthly prizes will be on offer to top performers. Users can also visit and view the dashboard of other users to see what questions they are taking part in. ★ REVENUE SHARING:We are opening the platform to allow you to submit questions and topics of your own writing. If your question passes review and is selected for inclusion on the site, you will earn 1% of the entire bet pool! This is ripe for influencers and community organizers - send your community to engage your question, and earn a percentage of everything regardless of the outcome.We'd love to hear what you think!
